meanings.definition: Provide funding for (a person or enterprise)
meanings.sent1: My dad financed my college education.
meanings.sent2: The bank financed the new business venture.
meanings.sent3: I financed my friend's ice cream craving.
meanings.sent5: The kind donor financed the entire charity event.

meanings.definition: Obtain or provide funding for (a project)
meanings.sent1: The government financed the construction of the new bridge.
meanings.sent2: She financed the renovation of her house with a loan.
meanings.sent3: The cat financed the mouse's escape plan.
meanings.sent4: His determination financed the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The sponsor financed the research project on climate change.
